best_gem_comment: This course was awesome! It's a gem if you have some musical experience under your belt, and it is perfect if you're looking for a class to formalize theory that you have already picked up on through playing music.
best_gem_comment_short: It's a gem if you have some musical experience under your belt, and it is perfect if you're looking for a class to formalize theory that you have already picked up on through playing music.

best_gem_comment: TAKE THIS COURSE!!!! It is truly a gem... in so many ways! When else can you learn how to appreciate the different parts of opera and the history of opera? It truly is not as intimidating as it looks, and the course is designed to be very welcoming and approachable from all fields. You definitely don't have to be involved in music to any extent to take this course, but it does help to have some background if you can. This is one of the most unique courses I have taken here at Harvard... with the BEST in the field (Professor Abbate!)
best_gem_comment_short: It is truly a gem... in so many ways!
